admin_templates.template: <xen:controlunit label="{$preparedOption.title}"> <xen:html> <xen:textbox name="options[{$preparedOption.option_id}]" value="{$preparedOption.option_value}" inputclass="AutoComplete AcSingle" placeholder="{xen:phrase user_name}..." size="40" /> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> </xen:controlunit>
{xen:phrase lfc_rebuild_photo_contest_entry_thumbnails}

<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{$options.limit}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase lfc_widget_contests}"}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase lfc_widget_order_field}:" name="{$namePrefix}orderField" value="{xen:if '{$options.orderField}', $options.orderField, 'avatarOnlyBigger'}"> <xen:option value="created_at">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_created_at}</xen:option> <xen:option value="posting_opens_on">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_posting_opens_on}</xen:option> <xen:option value="posting_closes_on">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_posting_closes_on}</xen:option> <xen:option value="voting_opens_on">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_voting_opens_on}</xen:option> <xen:option value="voting_closes_on">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_voting_closes_on}</xen:option> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:radiounit label="{xen:phrase lfc_widget_order_direction}:" name="{$namePrefix}orderDirection" value="{xen:if '{$options.orderDirection}', $options.orderDirection, 'avatarOnlyBigger'}"> <xen:option value="DESC">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_desc}</xen:option> <xen:option value="ASC">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_asc}</xen:option> </xen:radiounit>
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}featured" value="1" selected="{$options.featured}">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_latest_entries_only_featured}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{$options.limit}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase lfc_widget_latest_entries_explain_limit}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase lfc_widget_latest_entries_thumb_size}:" name="{$namePrefix}thumbSize" value="{$options.thumbSize}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase lfc_widget_latest_entries_explain_thumb_size}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}includeClosed" value="1" selected="{$options.includeClosed}">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_latest_entries_include_closed}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}onlyWinningEntries" value="1" selected="{$options.onlyWinningEntries}">{xen:phrase lfc_widget_latest_entries_only_winning_entries}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>

phrases.phrase: Sorry but this contest is closed.
Sorry but this contest is currently closed to voting.
Sorry, you can't edit your entry once the contest has closed.
Sorry, you can't edit your entry once voting has started.
Photo Contest Entry in '{contest}' posted by {name}, {date}.
You've reached the maximum number of enties allowed: {limit}

{username} submitted a new contest entry:
[url={contestEntryLink}]{title}[/url]
[quote]{snippet}[/quote]
[url={contestEntryLink}]View contest entry...[/url]

Someone submitted a new contest entry:
[url={contestEntryLink}]{title}[/url]
[quote]{snippet}[/quote]
[url={contestEntryLink}]View contest entry...[/url]
If a user does not have permission to add post/edit entries, this setting will not apply.
If a user does not have permission to like entries, this setting will not apply.
Contest Closed (automatically "checked" after vote closing date)
Hide contest entry authors from public view
Hide entries from public view until voting opens
Number of winners for this contest
Moderate all contest entries posted in this contest
You've reached the maximum number of votes allowed: {limit}
Entries will become visible when the contest opens for voting on {date}
Closing date should be after contest opening date
Voting close date should be after vote opening date
Sorry, you are not allowed to participate in this contest.
Please enter a reason for reporting this entry
The requested contest entry could not be found.
The requested contest could not be found.
Someone likes one of your contest entries
Thank you for reporting this contest entry
There are no contests to display
No entries yet, be the first.
User has at least X contest entries
User has won at least X contests
Placing "C" at the end will crop the image to the exact size from the center of the image.
Include entries from closed / ended contests
Your contest entry has been posted
Your contest entry has been updated
Are you sure you want to delete {count} contest entries(s)?
Are you sure you want to like this contest entry?
Are you sure you want to unlike this contest entry?
Photo contest removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Photo contest entry removed from public view (reason: {reason})
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded. Use spaces or line break between extensions.
The maximum allowed dimensions for attached images (width x height). Use 0 or blank to not restrict dimensions.
Provide the maximum attachment file size in kilobytes (KB). Attachments over this size will be rejected.
The maximum width and height of generated attachment thumbnails.
If selected, whenever a contest entry is created, a thread will be posted in this forum.

Normally, when threads are automatically created for contest entries, the thread title is just the contest entry title. This option lets you specify a format for the thread title. Use {title} where the contest entry title should appear.
Select the forum into which new discussions will be created for contest winners.
You can use the following tokens to form the message: {title} {description} {contestUrl} {contestEntryUrl} {winnersHtml}
You can use the following token to form the title: {title}
If left blank it won't be able to create threads
Placing "C" at the end will crop the image to the exact size from the center of the image.
Placing "C" at the end will crop the image to the exact size from the center of the image.
View likes count before voting closes

<xen:title>{xen:phrase lfc_create_contest}</xen:title>
<form action="{xen:link 'photo-contests/insert'}" method="post" class="xenForm Preview AutoValidator" data-redirect="on"> <xen:include template="lfc_contest_form"> <xen:set var="$savePhrase">{xen:phrase lfc_create_contest}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$liveTitlePhrase">{xen:phrase lfc_create_contest}</xen:set> </xen:include> </form>

<script type="text/javascript">
  $(document).ready(function(){
    $('.bxslider').bxSlider({
      mode: 'fade', // Type of transition between slides (horizontal, vertical, fade)
      autoStart: true, // Auto show starts playing on load. If false, slideshow will start when the "Start" control is clicked
      auto: true, // Slides will automatically transition
      autoControls: true, // Show slider controls
      autoHover: true, // Auto show will pause when mouse hovers over slider
      adaptiveHeight: true, // Dynamically adjust slider height based on each slide's height
      pause: 4000 // The amount of time (in ms) between each auto transition
    });
  });
</script>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase lfc_delete_contest}: {$contest.title}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:photo-contests, $contest}"> {$contest.title} </xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'photo-contests/delete', $contest}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay">
<xen:include template="helper_deletion_type_unit" />
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase lfc_delete_contest}" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase lfc_edit_contest}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:photo-contests, $contest}"> {$contest.title} </xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'photo-contests/update', $contest}" method="post" class="xenForm Preview AutoValidator" data-redirect="on"> <xen:include template="lfc_contest_form"> <xen:set var="$savePhrase">{xen:phrase save_changes}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$liveTitlePhrase">{xen:phrase lfc_edit_contest}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$isUpdate">true</xen:set> </xen:include> </form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase lfc_create_contest_entry}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link photo-contests, $contest}"> {$contest.title} </xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'photo-contests/insert-contest-entry', $contest}" method="post" class="xenForm Preview AutoValidator" data-redirect="on"> <xen:include template="lfc_contest_entry_form"> <xen:set var="$isInsert">true</xen:set> <xen:set var="$savePhrase">{xen:phrase lfc_create_contest_entry}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$liveTitlePhrase">{xen:phrase lfc_create_contest_entry}</xen:set> </xen:include> </form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase lfc_delete_contest_entry}: {$contestEntry.title}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:photo-contests, $contest}"> {$contest.title} </xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:photo-contest-entries, $contestEntry}"> {$contestEntry.title} </xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'photo-contest-entries/delete', $contestEntry}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay">
<xen:include template="helper_deletion_type_unit" />
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase lfc_delete_contest_entry}" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase lfc_edit_contest_entry}: {$contestEntry.title} </xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link photo-contests, $contest}"> {$contest.title} </xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link photo-contest-entries, $contestEntry}"> {$contestEntry.title} </xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'photo-contest-entries/update', $contestEntry}" method="post" class="xenForm Preview AutoValidator" data-redirect="on"> <xen:include template="lfc_contest_entry_form"> <xen:set var="$savePhrase">{xen:phrase save_changes}</xen:set> <xen:set var="$liveTitlePhrase">{xen:phrase lfc_edit_contest_entry}</xen:set> </xen:include> </form>
{xen:raw $editorTemplate}

<xen:title>{$contestEntry.title} - {xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase lfc_unlike_contest_entry}', '{xen:phrase lfc_like_contest_entry}'}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase lfc_unlike_contest_entry}', '{xen:phrase lfc_like_contest_entry}'}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link photo-contests, $contest}"> {$contest.title} </xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link photo-contest-entries, $contestEntry}"> {$contestEntry.title} </xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'photo-contest-entries/like', $contestEntry}" method="post" class="xenForm"> <dl class="ctrlUnit fullWidth surplusLabel"> <dt></dt> <dd> <xen:if is="{$like}"> {xen:phrase lfc_you_sure_you_want_to_unlike_this_contest_entry} <xen:else /> {xen:phrase lfc_you_sure_you_want_to_like_this_contest_entry} </xen:if> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase lfc_unlike_contest_entry}', '{xen:phrase lfc_like_contest_entry}'}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" autofocus="true" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
contest-entry-{$contestEntry.photo_contest_entry_id} {xen:link 'photo-contest-entries/like', $contestEntry} #likes-{$contestEntryId} {xen:link login} LoginControl

contest-entry-{$contestEntry.photo_contest_entry_id} contestWinner contestWinner-{$contestEntry.position} {$contestEntry.title} {$contestEntry.username} true

<xen:title>{xen:phrase lfc_report_contest_entry}: {$contestEntry.title} </xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:photo-contests, $contest}"> {$contest.title} </xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:photo-contest-entries, $contestEntry}"> {$contest.title} </xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'photo-contest-entries/report', $contestEntry}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase report_reason}:</label></dt> <dd> <textarea name="message" id="ctrl_message" rows="2" class="textCtrl Elastic"></textarea> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase lfc_report_contest_entry}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

modification.description: Add moderation queue count for contest entries
